title: Botlane is 4/17
body: Adc with 8k dmg , Mid 7/12, they all lost their towers early, but we lost because i picked Nunu top. I see that now, sorry for picking Nunu top.

replies.body:
I stubbed my toe this morning.
God damnit, fuck this waterbottle. 
If only I wasn't so focused on holding it, then I would've watched where I was going.

sivir will literally run in 1v2 4 times in a row and die but it's my fault we lost the laning phase because I messed up a WQ combo on Alistar.
edit: and they didn't even get a kill from the messed up combo.
Shouldnt have picked nunu top.

I mostly play adc and most games have your entire team shitting on you if you fall behind and once that happen's you can't farm for shit since the enemy will dive you non stop or not let you farm. No wonder people just go full yolo when the team turns on you.

Hell it's not uncommon for the feed top or mid just to shit on bot lane too to set the adc behind even more so no wonder she went stupid.

Remember folks, even if ADC just broke new world record in feeding, it's his teams fault. Bad support, bad jungler and definitely that idiot in top lane that didn't help him at all. Actually it's his fault we lost this game! Not that enemy ADC can oneshot baron now, it's his fault. Now /all report nunu. he troll.

This garbage "i am the king of this game" ADCs way of thinking was exactly the main reason why i never bothered to play ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=Saianna,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pTeNIW6W,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-02-25T00:06:09.018+0000)
>
> Remember folks, even if ADC just broke new world record in feeding, it's his teams fault. Bad support, bad jungler and definitely that idiot in top lane that didn't help him at all. Actually it's his fault we lost this game! Not that enemy ADC can oneshot baron now, it's his fault. Now /all report nunu. he troll.
> 
> This garbage "i am the king of this game" ADCs way of thinking was exactly the main reason why i never bothered to play ranked.

That's what low elo players say, constantly baiting their adc, never peeling, starving them from gold and EXP and complaining about them not dealing enough damage. Hilarious!
that's what adc mains say
Bringing rank into the picture is usually a big nono, but i guess you wouldn't understand since you aren't ranked, you hypocrite.
Your adc hate boner is showing
then stop looking, perv
Dont kink shame me
ye this pretty much sums up how we think
As if it was only ever the ADC who'd flame like this lmao

Dude, as if such people doesnt exist in every damn role?


Toxic people exist everywhere, Zed, Yasou, Vayne and the entire "high skillcap" rooster frequently flames like hell last i checked furthermore its been a thing for ages, and Hashinshin is probably the most well known flamer in league and he plays toplane. 


You can just drop the bias and realize that anyone in any game can suddenly turn toxic as hell, it can happen at literally any time from seemingly anything. 


All you can do is keep your cool and not get dragged into it, but it takes not being biased towards any role or group of people.

That build is great you get well over 200 ap just from seraphs. I snowballed and killed a lategame jinx with a gold lead under tower while greeding my ultimate.

Darius was pushing into me constantyl that game so I wasnt warding in lane. I payed too many games too have a clear memory of after laning phase but i dont think there was mcuh chance too ward. Its not like you have any vision in league when behind because they clear wards in your jungle and if you walk into jungle after they do you are dead.

It's true i had no bonus hp but you get a massive heal on your Q. I can do my job as a tank with that build and i dotn see how building full tank lets an 8k adc deal 30000 so we can win the game.

'

I was building the fh too survive Darius, I didnt want too sit on the tear after completeion. I should have built abysal mask next yes Captain Hindsight but it's not why we lost.

I did double my adcs damage lol and not feed my lane opponent but i'm as much reason we lost that, sure. I wasnt claiming i played the perfect game and was stomping but I dont get it when someone crys about me when it's the other lanes that lose and we have a tutorial adc.

edit: actually i did lose tower because i roamed and then helped udyr chase then dive someone becasue he was going too die if i didnt come. Next time i need too leave my teammmate too die and come back top. Just wasnt registered in my memory as me losing tower i suppose. I dint mean too lie.

If you wanted an armor item to survive Darius, a smart option would be {{item:3075}} for the healing redux, comparatively high armor stat and even a little extra HP. Or since you keep talking about his waveclear being superior to yours, getting {{item:3068}} would also have been a better choice since it provides armor, HP, and some extra waveclear to counter-balance that issue you were having. As stated already, Frozen Heart is for countering auto-attacking AD champs (think {{champion:22}} {{champion:67}}  or {{champion:29}} ) not champs who deal the vast majority of their damage from skills (like {{champion:122}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:80}} ). 

While it's true that you cannot always help losing lanes (I'm a jungler...believe me, I understand) and that sometimes no changes you make in your champion or item selections could have changed the outcome of the game, it's still important to recognize mistakes and improve each little thing one at a time. :D
looks like their top and mid carried that game not their bot lane, when you lose top that hard you probably deserve to lose the game as well buddy.

I was 1 kill down vs Darius because I lost 1 really close all in, i didnt lose top hard i was the only player who could keep their tower. Saying I lost lane "hard" without looking at the tower kills or champ means your dumb.

Edit: Now i remember the Darius was actually really bad.

you were 5-7 to the dariuses 9-3 while he also did double your damage, saying that you lose because of "muh team" is complete bullshit here. you are playing a champion with amazing waveclear top and you bring up keeping your tower as doing well in lane? that's like saying anivia players are all gods because its virtually impossible to siege against.

The game was 45 26 and there was no way not too die because if my team loses the teamfight I die after. That darius can ult last hit doesnt mean he played well.

"you are playing a champion with amazing waveclear top and you bring up keeping your tower as doing well in lane? " 
Nunu waveclear isnt that good Darius has better infact, and i'm not shoving vs Darius as a tank unless he is out of lane or im making a big wave go too his tower instead of freeze. Keeping my tower isnt doing well in lane yes but losing 2 of your own straight away is bad and losing towers is snowballing the enemy team. I bring up keeping my towerr because you say i lost lane "hard" with no idea or  comprehension of what happneded that match.

>The game was 45 26 and there was no way not too die because if my team loses the teamfight I die after.  

this is actually a valid point, even though it doesn't look like too many team fights actually happened that game.

>Nunu waveclear isnt that good Darius has better infact 

I mean this depends on the skill order and build but I guess with you maxing w last it makes sense yes. 

>That darius can ult last hit doesnt mean he played well.

>Edit: Now i remember the Darius was actually really bad.

that's pretty rich considering his winning 90% of his darius games at your elo and 70% of all his games. 

>you say i lost lane "hard" with no idea or comprehension of what happneded that match.

I see that udyr helped you out and got you an early kill which you proceeded to get out farmed for the entire game, died 1v1 and were down gold the entire game before any "snowballing" from his team could come in.

sums up non meta picks.
if you pick something outside the meta and you win the game you get ignored, you could go 999/0/999 and you'll be ignored.
BUT, pick something outside the meta and LOSE? oh boy prepare yourself you will be blamed for literally everything

Nunu Top is a
NoNo__
Good thing this game is all about the kda so you can get those sweet upvotes before they look into the game and see why you were a reason your team lost

Unless i play anivia or run it down bot how do i make bot go 4/17 lol? Or does going 4/17 not lose games? My kda wasnt actaully good but im not going too survive a teamfight as an immobile if we lose unless i just watch my team.

Well, when botlane is that far behind, teamfighting shouldn't be on your list of priorities, since your team obviously isn't prepared to be dealing with that. 

What I think is the best thing you can do is to defend when they are grouped, ward safely, and find picks. if your team doesn't cooperate for that purpose, then...that's the nature of the game. There's only so much you can do as a single player in a 5-player team.

It's the off-meta struggle. Half the time you lose games just because your team intentionally throws cause your off-meta pick "doesn't work". You could be 10-0 and your bot lane is 0/17 and they'll be talking about your pick. But then again nobody accepts responsibility anyway for their mistakes, it's why they're stuck in whatever elo they're in. Blaming the off-meta pick is an easy scapegoat but if it wasn't that they'd find something else, like blaming their jungler or their support. Just gotta deal with it if you play champs in off-meta roles.

This coming from someone who has only played off-meta stuff for the last 4 seasons.

Literally uninstalled lol yesterday to take a break until new kayle arrives, lost around 12 games in a row basically, every damn game i had the craziest team mates, Lux dies mid at minute 5 solo to her laner , literally she writes OMFG THIS RE****DED BOTLANE

Like what, last game i had trundle writing we need to group, and then goes 3 times in a row chasing jana late game through the enemy jungle solo just to get ganked by 5 people.

Game before that my team mates start flaming each other since minute 1, of course we lose cause they stand there typing instead of playing, i literally wish there was no chat in game cause when i see my team mates arguing i know we already lost
I know this sounds petty, but picking nunu top might have tilted them and caused them to play bad.
That's beyond stupid, no amount of tilt makes someone play that badly.
If people can ragequit by tilting then i think losing their cool enough to get stupid is possible too.

> [{quoted}](name=BlueBoy33572,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pTeNIW6W,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-02-24T18:44:48.029+0000)
>
> That's beyond stupid, no amount of tilt makes someone play that badly.

Hahahaha. I wish.

if they tilt that easily then they probably shouldn't be playing league of legends with any competitive "I want to win" mentality.

they should be going into every game with the "I'm going to lose most of my matches and probably be the weakest link because of how bad my mental game is"

Top lane is 0/7

Enemy Fiora 7/0

Yikes.
It's called "pre-tilting" - making your team tilted before entering the game, making them play like shit. Own it! :P
